description.name: TWEETS_PER_LANG
readQueries: CTAS_TWEETS_PER_LANG : create table tweets_per_lang as select lang, count(*) from tweets window tumbling(size 1 minute) group by lang;
writeQueries: id:CTAS_TWEETS_PER_LANG - create table tweets_per_lang as select lang, count(*) from tweets window tumbling(size 1 minute) group by lang;
